name: aaiti
description: A.A.I.T.I v2.1.0 - Auto AI Trading Interface: Production-Ready AI Trading Platform

scripts.start: echo 'ðŸš€ A.A.I.T.I is production-ready! Use Docker installation instead.' && echo 'ðŸ“– Run: ./install for interactive Docker setup'
scripts.health: node -e "const http = require('http'); const timeout = 10000; console.log('ðŸ” Checking backend health...'); const req = http.get('http://localhost:5000/api/health', { timeout }, (res) => { let data = ''; res.on('data', (chunk) => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => { try { const health = JSON.parse(data); console.log('âœ… Backend is healthy:', JSON.stringify(health, null, 2)); } catch (e) { console.log('âœ… Backend responded:', data); } }); }); req.on('error', (err) => { console.log('ðŸ”´ Backend not running - use Docker installation'); console.log('ðŸ“– Run: ./install'); }); req.on('timeout', () => { req.destroy(); console.log('ðŸ”´ Backend health check timed out'); }); req.setTimeout(timeout);"
scripts.check: node --version && npm --version && echo 'âœ… System check complete'
scripts.status: npm run version:show && npm run health
scripts.test: echo "âœ… Use Docker installation - run './install' for setup"
